params.displaySolutionDescription: Task is updated to contain the solution.
params.a11yClickableTextLabel: Full text where words can be marked
params.a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
params.a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
params.a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
params.textField:
The correct words are marked like this: *correctword* 

The correct words are marked like lorem: *ipsum*

The correct words are marked like foo: *bar*
